# Welcome to My Portfolio

Hello, myself Koushik. I am working as Principal Data Scientist at S&P Global Market Intelligence, based in Bangalore, India. With nearly nine years of industry experience, I specialize in tackling diverse analytical challenges and empowering stakeholders with data-driven insights.

Here, you'll find updates on my career journey and insightful blog posts covering a range of topics relevant to my expertise. Whether it's delving into cutting-edge data science techniques or discussing industry trends, my portfolio is a hub for sharing knowledge and experiences.
